name: Escuela de Empresas USFQ
description:
Based on the philosophy of Liberal Arts, the School of Business of Universidad San Francisco de Quito is the symbol of free thought with an interdisciplinary, creative and enterprising focus. It is a pioneer in providing integrated solutions for the career development of participants and organizational growth.

Since 2005, the goal of the Business Education area has been forming leaders with critical and creative thinking, and it has promoted educational programs on entrepreneurship of a significant number of institutions in the public and private sectors.
